author: Truth Collins
comment: I wish I could send MIDI or OSC  commands via WIFI to a virtual MIDI port on Windows.

author: Serge tkint
comment: Got into config and got stuck. No cancel accepted, no exit. Poor tested app. I ll do some more test....

reply.author: KAndySoft UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
reply.content: Please send us more information to info@kandysoft.de about this issue and the screen size of your device. Thank you.

title: Poorly tested app.

author: Don Boss
comment: I use this for controlling my hue lights in my bed room/bath room and hallway. I use a  Bluetooth microphone thats linked to my tablet, I can be 20 to 30 feet away and still have perfect voice control

reply.author: KAndySoft UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
reply.content: We are pleased to hear that, thank you!

title: Works great

author: Alexander Hubbs
comment: Devs are doing a great job on this project. I've used autovoice and tasker in the past, and this method is more consistent and quicker responding. Will definitely recommend. Devs - could you add a cancel voice command for when the device is accidently triggered? I keep the device stored away on continuous listen, and an accidental trigger takes approximately 10s to wrap up. It can be annoying. Great work, looking forward to updates.

reply.author: KAndySoft UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the feedback! You can already say "Nothing" or "Thanks" to cancel the speech input after it was triggered. We will add "Cancel" to that list in the next version.

title: Fantastic

reply.author: KAndySoft UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
reply.content: We are pleased to hear that, thank you!

author: Craig Zych
comment: Neat idea but doesn't support my rest server with authentication

reply.author: KAndySoft UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
reply.content: Authentication is supported, you should be asked for username and password. Https is also supported when you add your Server by the button "add manually" in the discovery dialog. Make sure your Server is reachable by this URL by the device, e.g. in the browser.

title: Neat idea
